issue.title: Allow IP address of interface to be changed

content.raw:
Just to restate things to make sure I understand the desired behavior:

* the hands have a fixed (known) IP address, as current
* a collection of machines are able to reach the hand (i.e. they are on the same subnet, or some other correctly routed network)
* through some packet, presumably sent over command-line or at the start of the ROS driver, a controlling machine is able to tell the hand its IP address (after which presumably the hand will do ARP)

Is that the behavior you'd like to see?
